snippet: "The Interview," the provocative comedy that triggered a  devastating cyberattack on Sony Pictures, went straight to U.S. consumers on Wednesday in an unprecedented online debut after hacker threats prevented its wide release on Christmas day....

headline.print_headline: Sony Puts 'The Interview' on YouTube, Other Digital Platforms
headline.main: Sony Puts 'The Interview' on YouTube, Other Digital Platforms

lead_paragraph: "The Interview," the provocative comedy that triggered a  devastating cyberattack on Sony Pictures, went straight to U.S. consumers on Wednesday in an unprecedented online debut after hacker threats prevented its wide release on Christmas day.
